title: Baseball mania
review: Taking a gamble is one thing; making it into drama is another.Brad Pitt does a credible job of acting.

title: Lacking in drama
review:
An inherently exciting event goes down badly. Ryan Gosling is too pedestrian.
.

title: Gripping
review: The Robin Hood story doesn't quite mKe it but the acting by Russel Crowe and Christian Bale keeps you engaged.

title: Fun funnier
review: Well done comedic piece with outstanding portrayals by Zach Galifianakis and Bradley Cooper.

title: Magic realism
review: FAntasy love story with a healthy dose of magic realism. Good portrayals by Patrick Swazy and Whoopie Goldberg.

title: Too long
review: An epic story much too long to support the underlying drama. Kirk Douglas and Jean Simmons do well in their respective roles. Peter Ustinov defines the role.

title: Little known
review: Well dramatized story about a little known subject deserving of much more publicity. Superb acting by Ryan Phillips, Joseph Gordon Levittown, Channing Tatum and Abbie Cornish.

title: Well done horror
review: In the horror genre this is a well directed and acted horror movie.Toni Collette does a terrific job of acting.

title: I was too young to know the difference
review: Seeing this classic again after childhood made me realize I was too young to make a difference. Humphrey and Ingrid supported byClaude, Sidney and Paul made the movie.

title: Strong characterizations
review: A classic intense look at several characters and their inner selves. Tallulah Bankhead, Hume Cronyn and William Bendixplay memorable roles.

title: Done again
review: Another in the Rocky saga. Well done and well acted. Good boxing shots and well played by Stallone.

title: Top Notch
review: A classic movie, pure drama, excellent acting strong characterization, great directing. Inspired acting by Henry Fonda, Ed Begley, Jack Warden, E G Marshall and Lee J Cobb.

title: Touching
review: Touching but predictable love story well played by Ryan Gosling and Rachel MacAdams.

title: Doppelgängers
review: Well dramatized and well acted fantasy movie of doppelgängers in the modern age with action centered on a black family.

title: Moving story
review: Well dramatized story of racial prejudice, belief in something grater and the magic of belief. Exceptional acting by Jakob Salvatti.

title: Spellbinding
review: Well written, well portrayed story of modern gangsterism, fascinating in its telling. Robert DeNiro,Joe Pesci and Al Pacino do a good job of acting.

title: Affectating
review: Wonderfully put together affectating tale of young love and it's uncertainty. Joseph Gordon-Levittown and Zooey Deschanel star.

title: Hard boiled
review: The character. Is driven and the movie moves with the same outward speed. It makes for interesting viewing but doesn't penetrate very far in the human psyche. Jessica Chastain is good in a hard-boiled sort of way.

title: A retelling
review: Nothing really new or dramatic here. John David Washington and Adam Driver do a credible job of acting.

movie_title: The Best Years of Our Lives
title: Timeless
review: Real people, real stories , real acting; fun to watch. It fit the times!

title: Storybook Romance
review: A romantic tale set in Turkey during World War I touching on the Armenian genocide.

title: Taut
review: As crime movies go this is a worthy addition to the annals. Taut, fast auctioned and well acted, Ben Affleck and Jeremy Reiner are very effective.

title: 'Shudder' Island
review: I'm sorry I didn't like this film. I watch half of it and then gave up. It never gain traction. The moody I'm in S ST did nothing for me. I remain totally detach. I gave it a rating of two out of 10. Good luck

title: a winner with 2 negatives
review: Sure, Frances McDormand deserved the Oscar and the film was overall excellent with outstanding performances from Sam Rockwell and Woody Harrelson but there were 2 things about the movie that disturbed me: the inappropriate handling of the police station and billboard aftermaths. Other than that it was topnotch.

title: A Classic
review: Well directed, well acted, classic drama. Superb acting by Henry Fonda and John Carradine.

title: Work of art
review: From the fluttering.feather to the beginning and ending bus scene this movie is a treasure. Tom Hanks and Gary Sinise are exceptional.

title: Sad
review: The degradation of a famous rock writer and singer culminating in a kind of retribution. Acting by Remi Malik is good.

title: Fascinating
review: A gem by the Coen brothers, bringing together the comedic and acting talents of Frances McDermott, George Clooney,John Malkovitch,Brad Pitts, and Richard Jenkins.

title: First rate
review: A beautifully done portrayal of a courtroom drama with outstanding performance by Humphrey Bogart.

title: Engaging
review: Winsome story with some metaphors thrown in about man's relationship with God and his fellow man. Put aside the love story.It is only a distraction. Tom Hanks does an admirable job of acting.

title: Enjoyable
review: Vintage Clint Eastwood with good support from Amy Adams, John Goodman and Justin Timberlake. An entertaining baseball story.

title: Epic proportions
review: A classic epic love story set during the Russian revolution. Omar Sharif and Rod Steiger do a great kin of acting.

title: Frankly dear I don't give a damn
review: A classic with beautiful cinematography and staging. Vivienda Leigh is outstanding as Scarlett.

title: EpÃ­tome war movies
review: This seems to bring to modern s3nsibilities the utter cruelty and futility of war. Fine portrayal by Tom Hanks.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Familiar story
review: Inventive retelling of a sad story in an alternate reality. Brad Pitt deserved best supporting actor!

title: Catastrophe
review: Outstanding special effects and good believable acting.

title: Magic realism
review: The magic realism is there. Whether you believe it or not it is a convenient way to introduce the authors beliefs . I found the movie entertaining and worthwhile although certainly not original.

title: Complicated
review: Very twisted blow them up tale with a surprise ending.. Acting by Liam Neeson, DiNe Kruger and JNuary Jones above average.

title: Grand movie
review: A good storyline showcasing racism and humanity. Good acting, well directed.

title: Thoughtful
review: Well dramatized and thoughtful presentation of a thorny and difficult subject. Good acting by Sam Jackson And Tommy Lee Jones.

title: Pleasant
review: A lot of singing and dancing requiring a willing suspension of belief; that having been said, there is something missing here!

title: Exquisite
review: A paragon of sports films,a masterpiece, music, acting, stagecraft, and photography with outstanding acting by Ben Crossley and Ian Charleston.

title: Not clear
review: I get so many robo calls I'm not sure what the big deal is about privacy. I'm resigned to being surveilled backwards and forwards anyway. No foul, no harm. Acting and filming very good especially Joseph and Shailene.

title: It's about value
review: Helen Mirren is good and Ryan Reynolds is like James Stewart. Beautifully portrayed story of stolen artworks and man's inhumanity to man. Get comfortable for a well told story and just enjoy yourself.

title: Intriguing
review: Well told, well acted suspenseful drama. Brad Cooper doeya good job.

title: Nice
review: Well acted, well written and well directed sports story. Able acting by Kevin Costner.

title: Comic book
review: Interesting movie in the Superman category. Good acting. Music mostly retrospective.

title: Well done
review: A well done, well scripted, exciting real life drama of crime, Chicago style. Kevin Costner and Sean Connery both shine.

movie_title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
title: Worthy story
review: Well directed and acted. Lovely scenes and excellent photography. Well worth watching.

title: Predictable
review: A well proven formula, star actors plenty of action but predictable chain of events. I don't even think this is good entertainment.

title: Well done story
review: Well do, well directed,well acted epic. Good acting by Chris Hemsworth,Michael Shannon and Michael Peña.

title: Delightful
review: Well acted, Wells directed, and well presented. A delightful retelling of an old story!

title: War lacks glory
review: A telling portrayal of the tragedy of war. Excellent portrayals by Kirk Douglas and Ralph Meeker.

title: Moving drama
review: Well thought out, well directed, well acted drama about getting divorced. Very well acted by AdAm Driver and Scarlett Johansson. Well directed by Noah Baughbam.

title: Something light hearted
review: Heavy on biographical themes and interspersed with cheerful music it doesn't quite come off as interesting.

title: Somewhat funny
review: Sad comedic drama about a dreadful disease ably portrayed by Joseph Gordon-Levittown and Anna Kendrick.

title: Sparta lives
review: Well crafted, well staged, well acted war movie. Good portrayal by Gerard Butler.

title: Well done
review: The drama is inherent in the story but this movie brings the story in a dramatic and convincing way. Acting by Tom Hanks, Bill Paxton, and Gary Sinise is outstanding.

title: Enjoyable
review: Some parts didn't ring true and appeared gimmicky such as the gemstone and the interaction between Dr. Shirley and Nick. I thought Virgo Mortensen deserved a lot of credit for his acting..

title: Classic adventure film
review: Well done classic. Outstanding cinematography, costumes, scenery, acting, and directing. Acting was true to form all around.
